body:
Didn't read it yet but the ending seems ‘clever’ in the sense that at least, the woman doesn't suddenly end up addicted, enslaved or traumatized beyond repair.

[EDIT Δt+10min] Finished reading it. A bit sad, actually. Woman actually doesn't feel a thing with her hubby but doesn't tell him how lame he is because of their financial pinch (he's jobless). So, basically, the story is steadily moving to a situation where ‘bigger takes all’. Let's just hope she still keeps her wits around.
Honestly just read because of how ugly the guys are. How is it possible they're uglier than every UB i've ever read. Maybe its the nose... oy vey.
